demo.name: brd4104a.demo.soc_btmesh_iop_friend
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - IOP Test - Friend node

model:property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - IOP Test - Friend node

demo.model:description: Friend example for IOP test. This node acts as a friend for the low power node and caches messages sent to it when the low power node is sleeping.

demo.name: brd4181a.demo.soc_btmesh_iop_friend
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - IOP Test - Friend node

model:property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - IOP Test - Friend node

demo.model:description: Friend example for IOP test. This node acts as a friend for the low power node and caches messages sent to it when the low power node is sleeping.

demo.name: brd4181b.demo.soc_btmesh_iop_friend
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - IOP Test - Friend node

model:property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - IOP Test - Friend node

demo.model:description: Friend example for IOP test. This node acts as a friend for the low power node and caches messages sent to it when the low power node is sleeping.

demo.name: brd4104a.demo.soc_btmesh_iop_lpn
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - IOP Test - LPN node

model:property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - IOP Test - LPN node

demo.model:description: Low power node example for IOP test. This node acts as a typical low power device and sleeps most of the time. It needs a friend node to cache messages and forward them when polled.

demo.name: brd4181a.demo.soc_btmesh_iop_lpn
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - IOP Test - LPN node

model:property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - IOP Test - LPN node

demo.model:description: Low power node example for IOP test. This node acts as a typical low power device and sleeps most of the time. It needs a friend node to cache messages and forward them when polled.

demo.name: brd4182a.demo.soc_btmesh_iop_lpn
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - IOP Test - LPN node

demo.name: brd4104a.demo.soc_btmesh_iop_proxy
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - IOP Test - Proxy node

model:property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - IOP Test - Proxy node

demo.model:description: Proxy example for IOP test. This node forwards/relays messages between GATT and advertising bearers in the network.

demo.name: brd4181a.demo.soc_btmesh_iop_proxy
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - IOP Test - Proxy node

model:property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - IOP Test - Proxy node

demo.model:description: Proxy example for IOP test. This node forwards/relays messages between GATT and advertising bearers in the network.

demo.name: brd4181b.demo.soc_btmesh_iop_proxy
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - IOP Test - Proxy node

model:property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - IOP Test - Proxy node

demo.model:description: Proxy example for IOP test. This node forwards/relays messages between GATT and advertising bearers in the network.

demo.name: brd4104a.demo.soc_btmesh_iop_relay
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - IOP Test - Relay node

model:property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - IOP Test - Relay node

demo.model:description: Relay example for IOP test. This node acts as a relay, i.e. if a node is out of range for another node, it relays messages between the two, provided the relay node is in range for both.

demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - IOP Test - Relay node
